00094     template <class HDS> 
00095     struct HDSConcept {
00112         typedef typename hds_traits<HDS>::halfedge_descriptor halfedge_descriptor; 
00119 
00120 
00121         void constraints()
00125         {
00126             using namespace boost;
00127             function_requires<DefaultConstructibleConcept<halfedge_descriptor> >();
00128             function_requires<CopyConstructibleConcept<halfedge_descriptor> >();
00129             function_requires<EqualityComparableConcept<halfedge_descriptor> >();
00130             function_requires<AssignableConcept<halfedge_descriptor> >();

00144         }
